## SEARCH NOTE9 ON PCHOME

```{r cars}

library(httr)
library(xml2)
library(rvest)

url <-"https://ecshweb.pchome.com.tw/search/v3.3/all/results?q=note9&page=1&sort=rnk/dc"
res <- GET(url)
res
res_json <- content(res)
res_json
do.call(rbind,res_json$prods)
View(data.frame(do.call(rbind,res_json$prods)))
```
